title: (x) KFC Navigation font - FF Fontesque {renko}
content:
I was hoping someone could help with iding the font used for the navigation images on KFC.com.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203183155im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/kfc_nav_6153.gif)

TIA!

 [‹ (x) "N Touch Wireless" script - VGC Ingrid (Ingenious) {Mike F}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203183155/http:/www.typophile.com/node/20494 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Star Wars original movie poster credits - ITC Serif Gothic {Mark S} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203183155/http:/www.typophile.com/node/20498 "Go to next forum topic")
author: popstalin

comments.content:
Well, Nick Shinn doesn’t ring a bell for me.

I’d say have a look at [FF Fontesque](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203183155/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-fontesque/)

Yeah, I was looking at all the Nick Shinn fonts going, nope, not in there.

Thanks Renko!

You are welcome, Jen. Have a nice day.

EDIT: Woops, grumpy was right. Nick Shinn is the DESIGNER of FF Fontesque.  
Well, I wasn’t careful and learned something today.
